job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Summary:<br>The main function of the Data Scientist is to produce innovative solutions driven by exploratory data analysis from complex and high-dimensional datasets.<br>Working on commerce products on Facebook including Marketplace and shops.<br><br>Skills:<br>Experienced in either programming languages such as Python and/or R, big data tools such as Hadoop, or data visualization tools such as Tableau.<br>The ability to communicate effectively in writing, including conveying complex information and promoting in-depth engagement on course topics.<br>Experience working with large datasets.<br>
